snippet.title: Manor Lords | Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Manor Lords is a medieval strategy game featuring in-depth city building, large-scale tactical battles, and complex economic and social simulations. Rule your lands as a medieval lord -- the seasons pass, the weather changes, and cities rise and fall. Take charge of your people on Steam, GOG, and PC Game Pass on April 26th, 2024, with a console release date to be revealed at a later time. Manor Lords is a work in progress and is subject to change.

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363080/Manor_Lords/
Microsoft: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p5f966564fs
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/manor_lords

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/hoodedhorsepublishersale2023

Follow us on social media:
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/hoodedhorse
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoodedHorseInc
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/

https://www.youtube.com/HoodedHorse

Video Details:
Manor Lords | Release Date Reveal Trailer
https://youtu.be/m6xMqaVNpzY

#ManorLords #HoodedHorse #StrategyGame
